item.title: Socioeconomic Outlooks between Anglo and Franco-Canadians
item.description: ## TO CITE THIS SURVEY FILE: Stephenson, Laura B; Harell, Allison; Rubenson, Daniel; Loewen, Peter John, 2020, '2019 Canadian Election Study - Online Survey', ## https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/DUS88V, Harvard Dataverse, V1 ## LINK: https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/DUS88V Part I. Introduction First paragraph: The divide between English and French Canada has historically been the source of much social tension in this country. Franco-Canadians have historically found themselves in opposition to and oppressed by the English majority.
